alert.note: Alert for Newton; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 3:42PM CDT until April 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 342 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eula, or 14 miles southeast of Jasper, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Western Grove... Marsena... Eula... Piercetown... Carver... Moore... Duff... Point Peter... Maumee... St. Joe... Pindall... Gilbert... Bass... Yardelle... Silver Hill... Vendor... Mt Judea... Maumee Crossing... Snowball... Hasty... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
